meaningMnemonic: If you're <kanji>feeling</kanji> the <kanji>fever</kanji>, you're getting so into something that your body is heating up. You have a ton of  <vocabulary>passion</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
